translation:
Copy given on October 12, 1837.

Subscription with which the inhabitants of the District of Boqueirão contribute voluntarily to the needs of the present struggle for our independence, being monthly shares, each no less than 1$000, beginning on October 1, 1837, and for the period of three years.
